author: lightclient
content: <@!387536747476549632>, not sure i fully understand the question. If you use optimism then you only have control over the vm semantics (call structure, account properties, etc), at the instruction-level it will always execute according to the current version of mainnet. If you implement a full evm in evm interpreter then yes, you have complete flexibility - even at the instruction level.
